  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The damaged package was found on the unload roller line at door 11. QA went over with proper PPE, hazmat bucket and bag. Once QA contained the package, it was found that all four out of four batteries leaked. QA is unsure where the damage is and what caused it.

item.title: Report E-2024060687
item.description:
Report E-2024060687

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-30
  • City: NICHOLS
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG SPECIALTY PRODUCTS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6550
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The KAG Specialty Products Group, LLC driver arrived at the customer location and was preparing to initiate the delivery. It appears that a valve on the trailer was left in a partially open position. When the driver removed the discharge cap approximately 10 gallons of Bonderite C-IC was released. A portion of the spilled product sprayed on the driver and resulted in him seeking medical treatment. T&R Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.

item.title: Report I-2024060054
item.description:
Report I-2024060054

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T00:36:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: WATERTOWN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Christman Fuel Service Inc
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 468000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver took eyes off road, went of shoulder in a curve and rolled over in a vacant field. During rollover the over fill device installed in top of tanker was broken off allowing diesel to leak out of the hole. Manway/dome cover lids were struck and caused to partially open, allowing diesel to leak.

item.title: Report X-2024061877
item.description:

  • City: RONKONKOMA

item.title: Report X-2024061579
item.description:
Report X-2024061579

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-28T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-25
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box came off the trailer dry, but you could tell the cardboard had been wet. The box was put into a red hazmat bin. when I came in to work to look at the hazmat, I saw the box was dry, but inside the cap to one of the glass 4-liter containers was loose and 2 liters of the liquid was out of the glass liter container. I tightened the lid and checked all the other lids to make sure they were all tight.

item.title: Report X-2024061520
item.description:
Report X-2024061520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE BROKE OPEN REQUIRING A REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER BOXES PREPRINTED LEVEL 1 AEROSOLS. EACH INNER BOX CONTAINS TWELVE AEROSOL CANS OF AX-IT BASEBOARD STRIPPER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 729443, E. A. MORSE CO. INC., 1210 ROUTE 9, CASTLETON ON HUDSON NY 12033-9686.
